content:
"The world remains mysterious
because we haven't yet found the negative that reveals its truth."
These words were written on a postcard.
info: 车站建成庆典-幻雪_友邻任务闲聊

content:
Just like when I first saw those words,
My heart filled with anticipation,
Yearning for a journey to an unknown destination...
info: 车站建成庆典-幻雪_友邻任务闲聊

content:
I only recently discovered that...
These were promotional cards for Astralink travel from long ago.
And now, to see the Station completed...
info: 车站建成庆典-幻雪_友邻任务闲聊

content:
I have a place to call my own,
I've met my new neighbors,
And now, a new Astralink station lies before me.
info: 车站建成庆典-幻雪_友邻任务闲聊

content:
Indeed, not knowing what tomorrow brings,
Such a life
is truly the most exciting of all!
info: 车站建成庆典-幻雪_友邻任务闲聊
